page.title: 17MOBILE SERVICES
page.content: { {RETAIL SERVICES}Easington is visited by several mobile shops and vehicles amongst which are the following:- Mr Bradley the Butcher, McLeish the Baker,Mr Edmonds the Grocer all visit twice weekly.Mr Capron the Fish- man, Ringtons Tea and Mr Hooley with the Video library also visit the village. {MOBILE HEALTH CLINICS.}These consist of the Child Clinic and the Chiropody Clinic and Doctors house calls. {DELIVERY MEN}Coalmen and Milkmen. {OTHER SERVICES}These consist of the Mobile Library, Window Cleaner, and Refuse Collections.
